original: de dag tu skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag myong bas /
analyzed: de dag tu skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag myong bas /
translated: When they are born there, they will experience feelings of suffering.

original: las zad par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las zad par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, they will exhaust their karma.

original: de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas las zad par byas nas ci ste brgya la mir skye ba thob par gyur na'ang chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba
analyzed: de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas las zad par byas nas ci ste brgya la mir skye ba thob par gyur na'ang chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba
translated: because of the karma they have created and accumulated that leads to being deprived of the Dharma.

original: de dang der dmus long gi khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang der dmus long gi khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be born in families of outcastes,

analyzed: de dag tu skyes na'ang long ba rnams su 'gyur ba'am /

original: zhar ba rnams sam /
analyzed: zhar ba rnams sam /
translated: or with goiters,üîΩor with leprosy,üîΩor with tuberculosis,üîΩor with fevers,üîΩor with dysentery,üîΩor with stomach disorders,üîΩor with skin diseases,üîΩor with scabies,üîΩor with eczema,üîΩor with hemorrhoids,üîΩor with fistula,üîΩor with epilepsy,üîΩor with mental disorders,

analyzed: lce med pa rnams sam / lag pa med pa rnams sam /
translated: or with speech disorders,üîΩor with disorders of the four elements,

original: rkang pa med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rkang pa med pa rnams sam /

original: rna ba med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rna ba med pa rnams sam /

original: sna med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: sna med pa rnams sam /
translated: or with disorders of the eightfold noble path,üîΩor with disorders of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,üîΩor with disorders of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be born in places where they will not hear the word Buddha, will not hear the word Dharma, will not hear the word Sa·πÖgha, will not hear the word bodhisattva, and will not hear the word pratyekabuddha.

original: @88a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: @88a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable ≈öƒÅriputra said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúLord,

original: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag ni /
analyzed: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag ni /
translated: the five inexpiable sins

original: chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du'ang mi mchi lags so //
analyzed: chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du'ang mi mchi lags so //
translated: do not approach a fraction of the demerit of someone who, when this perfection of wisdom is being taught, thinks to himself: ‚ÄòI will oppose it, I will not accept it, I will not take it up, I will not keep it, I will not read it, I will not study it, I will not properly pay attention to it, I will not master it, I will not teach it, I will not explain it, I will not expound it, I will not proclaim it, I will not announce it, I will not demonstrate it, I will not make it clear, I will not make it intelligible, I will not make it manifest, I will not make it evident, I will not make it thoroughly evident.‚Äô

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu /üîΩgang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na zlog par sems shing /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na zlog par sems shing /
translated: ‚Äú≈öƒÅriputra,

analyzed: de dag 'di skad du / 'di ni / chos ma yin / 'di ni / 'dul ba ma yin /

original: 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin /

original: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs /
analyzed: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs /

analyzed: mi gsung / gsung bar mi 'gyur ba yin gyi /
